0.1.name: wordpress/aweber-super-simple
0.1.description:
Aweber Super Simple is a plugin that will subscribe a user whenever he/she registers to your blog.

The AWeber Super Simple options page allows you to configure the plugin to: * Choose whether or not to display the optin checkbox. Users may register if optin isn't shown, and will not added to autoresponder. * Choose a checked or unchecked default status for the optin checkbox on registration. * Provide a custom optin greeting message for visitors

This code base is at least once, possibly 3, 3 or more times removed from what was the original code base. Wherever or whenever the ultimate source, the base code is old in WordPress years. Current effort is to bring everything up to 2.8 coding standards before attempting any extensions.
